thread.title: Bajaj Auto sales inch up 3% in July
thread.title_full: Bajaj Auto sales inch up 3% in July | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Bajaj Auto sales inch up 3% in July
text:
Other Articles You are in jail by choice: Supreme Court bench to Sahara chief Subrata Roy Roland Folger to lead Mercedes India, Eberhard Kern headed for Europe No probe into purchase of aircraft by Air India: Govt Bajaj Auto today registered a 3 per cent increase in total sales in July at 3,30,231 units against 3,19,292 in the same month of 2014.
Motorcycle sales during the month rose 5 per cent to 2,82,433 units as against 2,67,841 in July last year, the company said in a BSE filing.
Bajaj Autoâ€™s commercial vehicles sales during the month stood at 47,798 units compared with 51,451 in the year-ago period, a decline of 7 per cent.
Its exports in July this year came in at 1,64,690 units as against 1,69,755 a year ago, down 3 per cent, the company said.
First Published on August 03, 2015 12:27 pm
